The extra time allows (if not limited by rules) to use the category longer than usually. It is used if the regular time was used up and does not expire otherwise.

Parent category

When the parent category of a category is blocked (e.g. because the time is over), then the child category is blocked too. When using the child category, the used time is also added to the parent category.
